name: Longcat
description: $NOBIKO is an ERC-20 token on the Ethereum blockchain inspired by Longcat, a popular internet meme originating from early Japanese forums such as 2channel. The project aims to preserve and celebrate early internet meme culture by tokenizing a recognizable symbol of that era. It serves as a cultural reference point within the meme token landscape and seeks to engage a nostalgic community. $NOBIKO also functions as a community-driven digital asset with planned ecosystem features.
